message: Let's get this started. A 70/30 split seems fair to me considering the circumstances.
Your offer was a bit too skewed in your favor. Let's be reasonable, I need to benefit from this deal too. How about a 45/55 split?
I understand you need to benefit too, but time is running out for you.  65/35 is my final offer.
Alice, this is getting ridiculous. I'm flexible, but I have my limits.  40/60 is the best you'll get - take it or leave it.
